title: GIFT City taps RBI for RTGS-like dollar payment system
description: Among the proposals currently being discussed was the establishment of a single 'settlement bank' in GIFT City, with which other entities would have dollar balances. Subsequently, debits & credits would be conducted through the settlement bank, sources said.
